title: My apps are starting to crash. It started with my Kaiser app and now it has spread to other apps
content: I have restarted the phone and applications. Forced stopped the apps and even uninstalled them but still nothing. I restarted the phone is safe mode to see it would help but Gmail app is still not functioning. If it's time for a new phone I understand but what happened is my question. One minute the apps are working fine and then they stop working.
